text: Murray Paul Sullivan (March 14, 1925 - November 11, 2018) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1945, 1946 and 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=sullimur001http://home.ican.net/~argos/mariners/profiles/961004.htm He was an alumnus of St. Michael's College, Toronto. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Canadian football running backs Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario
title: Murray Sullivan
